text: The Wey Mocha is a mid-size luxury Crossover SUV made by Wey a luxury brand of Great Wall Motors (GWM) since 2021. == History and Features == The Wey Mocha was shown at the Auto Shanghai in January 2021. in April of the same year sales started in China. The SUV was named after the Mocha Coffee. other vehicles of Wey named after types of Coffee were the Latte and the Macchiato these two were also shown at the Auto Shanghai. The Wey Mocha was initially avaliable only with a 2.0 liter turbo gasoline engine with a 9-speed DCT transmission but a Plug-in hybrid version with a multi-mode DHT transmission was launched later. == Markets == The Wey Mocha is sold mainly in China but in Europe untill the end of 2023 its sold as the Wey Coffee 01. since the start of 2024 its sold as the GWM Wey 05. == References == Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Wey Mocha
